_comment: corbat-coco MCP Server Configurations. Copy relevant servers to your Claude Code settings: ~/.claude/claude.json

github._description: GitHub operations — PRs, issues, repos, code search
github._priority: HIGH — most used for corbat-coco development

memory._description: Persistent memory across sessions — stores learned patterns, context
memory._priority: HIGH — enables continuous learning across sessions

_filesystem_disabled._description: Enhanced filesystem operations with search and indexing
_filesystem_disabled._priority: MEDIUM — useful for large codebase navigation
_filesystem_disabled._note: MACHINE-SPECIFIC — to enable, copy this entry to ~/.claude/claude.json as 'filesystem' and replace the path with your actual workspace root (e.g. /Users/yourname/workspace). Disabled here because the path cannot be shared across machines.

sequential-thinking._description: Chain-of-thought reasoning for complex multi-step problems

context7._description: Live documentation lookup — always up-to-date library docs

supabase._description: Supabase database operations — for projects using Supabase
supabase._priority: LOW — only needed if project uses Supabase

vercel._priority: LOW — only needed for Vercel deployments

railway._description: Railway deployments — for projects deployed on Railway
railway._priority: LOW — only needed for Railway deployments

firecrawl._description: Web scraping and crawling — for research tasks

clickhouse._description: ClickHouse analytics queries — for projects using ClickHouse
clickhouse._priority: LOW — only needed for ClickHouse projects
clickhouse._note: HTTP is safe for localhost only — use HTTPS if pointing to a remote ClickHouse instance

_usage.quick_start: To enable a server, add it to ~/.claude/claude.json under 'mcpServers'
_usage.docs: See docs/MCP.md for setup instructions and environment variables
